overview.title: Badge Component
overview.description: Badges display short status labels or counts. They can be rounded pills or small tags and may include a decorative dot.

css.title: CSS
css.code: /* See component style.css for the full reference styles. */

js.title: JavaScript
js.description: JavaScript is typically not required; badges often serve a purely visual role.

best-practices.title: Best Practices
points: Use concise text; avoid full sentences in badges.
Respect color contrast and avoid communicating status with color alone.
Use aria-labels if the badge needs to be announced more descriptively by screen readers.
Ensure badges don’t look like buttons unless they are interactive.
Keep consistent sizing across variants on the same surface.

props.name: dot
props.description: Whether to render a leading status dot.

questions.question: What is a good rule of thumb for badge text length?
answers: It should fill the container width
